==Personal life==

William Houston Stewart was born on 7 September 1822 at Kirkmichael House, Ayrshire.  He was the son of Admiral of the Fleet Sir [[Houston Stewart]] (1791–1875),<ref name=Onlinebio>[http://www.pdavis.nl/ShowBiog.php?id=976 Online biography William Houston Stewart.]</ref> and Martha (d. 1870), youngest daughter of Sir William Miller, Bart (1785–1846).<ref>[http://www.pdavis.nl/ShowBiog.php?id=96 Online biography Houston Stewart.]<br>{{cite web |last=Lundy |first=Darryl |url=http://www.thepeerage.com/p7070.htm#i70695 |title= ThePeerage.Com:- Admiral Sir William Houston Stewart and Martha Miller |publisher= The Peerage}}{{Unreliable source?|failed=y |date=August 2012}}<!--Lundy is not a reliable source so cite Lundy's reliable source See [[WP:SAYWHEREYOUREADIT]]--></ref>  William Houston Stewart is sometimes referred to as William Houston Shaw-Stewart; his paternal grandfather was [[Sir Michael Shaw-Stewart, 5th Baronet|Sir Michael Shaw-Stewart, Bt]] (1766–1825).<ref>[http://www.t4hepeerage.com/p7070.htm#i70695 ThePeerage.Com:- Admiral Sir Houston Stewart]<br>{{cite web |last=Lundy |first=Darryl |url=http://www.thepeerage.com/p25233.htm |title= Catherine Elizabeth Coote and Sir William Houston Shaw-Stewart |publisher= The Peerage}}{{Unreliable source?|failed=y |date=August 2012}}<!--Lundy is not a reliable source so cite Lundy's reliable source See [[WP:SAYWHEREYOUREADIT]]--></ref>
